vcontact.exports package¶

This module contains functions to exports the results of vcontact to be used by another software.

vcontact.exports.cytoscape module¶

Export functions to use the data generated with cytoscape. http://www.cytoscape.org/

vcontact.exports.cytoscape.contigs(network, contigs, clusters, path)[source]¶

Export the network and node information in a format that can be used with cytoscape (tab files).

Parameters:
  • network (sparse-matrix) – Similarity network.
  • contigs (dataframe) – Nodes information.
  • clusters (list) – Id of clusters to exports.
  • path (str) – basename of the exported files.
Returns:

Tuple of the path to the edge files and nodes information files
Return type:

tuple
vcontact.exports.cytoscape.membership(fi, B, contigs, clusters, clusters_list=None, criterion='predicted_family')[source]¶

Save the membership matrix in an input format for cytoscape (csv)

Parameters:
  • B (sparse_matrix) – Membership matrix.
  • contigs (pandas.df) – Contigs informations (required columns: pos, pos_cluster).
  • clusters (pandas.df) – Clusters information (required columns: pos, criterion).
  • cluster_list (list) – The output is restircted to thoses clusters.
  • criterion (str) – Column on wich group the membership.
  • fi (str) – Path to the output file.
vcontact.exports.cytoscape.clusters(cluster_network, contigs, clusters, criterion, path)[source]¶

Export the network and node information in a format that can be used with cytoscape (tab files).

Parameters:
  • cluster_network (sparse-matrix) – cluster network.
  • contigs (dataframe) – Nodes information.
  • clusters (list) – Id of clusters to exports.
  • path (str) – basename of the exported files.
Returns:

Tuple of the path to the edge files and nodes information files
Return type:

tuple

vcontact.exports.krona module¶

Export functions for krona. http://sourceforge.net/projects/krona/

vcontact.exports.krona.textfile(dataframe, fi, columns=('predicted_family', 'predicted_genus'), placeholder='Non affiliated')[source]¶

Write a text file from a dataframe to be used with Krona.

Parameters:
  • dataframe (pandas.DataFrame) – data.
  • fi (str) – path to the file to write.
  • columns (iterable) – Columns to use as wedges levels.
  • placeholder (str) – String to use when the value is N/A.
Returns:

Path to the file.
Return type:

str

Note

Use ktImportText test_krona
